Wind power.Description: Wind power and solar power are complementary renewable energy sources that can be used together to generate electricity.
Wind power and hydroelectric power are alternative renewable energy sources that can be used depending on the availability of wind or water resources.
Wind power and biomass energy can be used synergistically, where wind turbines can power biomass processing facilities.
Wind power and geothermal energy are independent renewable energy sources that can be harnessed separately without direct interaction.
